sentences.en: But many congressmen think it would usurp their responsibilities.
sentences.cn: 奥巴马之前也曾表示对这个想法感兴趣.

sentences.en: But you must not allow it to usurp a disproportionate share of your interest.
sentences.cn: 但你不应让它过多地占据你的兴趣.

sentences.en: Did she usurp his place in his mother's heart?
sentences.cn: 她取代了他在他母亲心目中的地位吗？

sentences.en: He became so ambitious that he finally plotted to usurp the throne.
sentences.cn: 他的野心越来越大,最后甚至密谋要篡夺皇位.

sentences.en: He did it in order to usurp the throne.
sentences.cn: 他那么做,其实就是想篡权.

sentences.en: He implies that Satan's attempt to usurp the throne of God the right thing to do!
sentences.cn: 他暗示撒但企图篡夺上帝的宝座,乃是正确的事!

sentences.en: Industrialism began to usurp the production and distribution functions of the family.
sentences.cn: 工业化生产已开始篡夺家庭生产和分配的功能.

sentences.en: Java indeed is beginning to usurp the standard network operating environment.
sentences.cn: 实际上,Java已开始篡夺标准的网络操作系统.

sentences.en: My lusts usurp the present tense And strangle Reason in his seat.
sentences.cn: 我的欲念掠取此刻并在他的座位上扼杀理性.

sentences.en: The duke attempted to usurp the throne.
The king's bastard plotted to usurp the throne.
sentences.cn: 国王的庶子阴谋篡夺王位.

sentences.en: The vice - president is trying to usurp the president's authority.
sentences.cn: 副总统想要夺取总统的权力.

sentences.en: Their greatest goal is to usurp power from the Fangs.
sentences.cn: 他们的最好目标是篡夺theFangs的权力.

sentences.en: Their position enabled them to usurp power.
sentences.cn: 他们所处的地位使其得以篡权.

sentences.en: There were a couple of attempts to usurp the young king.
sentences.cn: 屡次有人企图篡夺那位年轻国王的王位。

sentences.en: You must not allow it to usurp a disproportionate share of your interest.
sentences.cn: 你不应让它过多地占据你的兴趣.

trans.tran_cn: 篡夺, 篡位, 侵占
trans.tran_en: to take someone else’s power, position, job etc when you do not have the right to

trans.tran_cn: 篡夺，侵占，霸占，盗用，夺取，强夺
